===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# stem of the ''[[Akebia]]'', especially {{taxlink|Akebia quinata|species|noshow=1}} or {{taxlink|Akebia trifoliata|species|noshow=1}} ([[herb]]s used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to improve cardiac function and alleviate joint-pain.)

* {{l|zh|利湿药}} ''("dampness-eliminating" herbs )''
